name: Bmac-warehouse
body:
Instructors or developers who are interested in adapting RMHP-Homebase for a different non-profit application may freely download and use any of the following resources as a starting point:

1.  <a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ffhEiNDJuRV1b0pxssX8WTAgkp5AJpgTRcK4aNhe5z0/edit?usp=sharing" target="_blank">Design document<\a>
2.  [Code base](https://github.com/megandalster/bmac-warehouse)
3.  ["Sandbox" database]()
4.  [Course syllabus]() 
5.  [Weekly assignments]()
6.  [Final class presentation]()
7.  [Student evaluations]()

These resources are all licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Detailed guidance on adapting these materials to a new course will be available in our book "Open Source Software Development," which will appear as a Kindle book.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
